analysis.description:
Broker.confirmPurchase (/unique_chucks/43/0xa3c0a687a6665b9f2f7e718215fbb9cb588283a9.sol#288-305) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- seller.transfer(item.price - developerfee) (/unique_chucks/43/0xa3c0a687a6665b9f2f7e718215fbb9cb588283a9.sol#304)
	- developer.transfer(developerfee) (/unique_chucks/43/0xa3c0a687a6665b9f2f7e718215fbb9cb588283a9.sol#305)

Broker.abortByBroker has external calls inside a loop:
	- buyers[x].transfer(val) (/unique_chucks/43/0xa3c0a687a6665b9f2f7e718215fbb9cb588283a9.sol#280-281)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/43/0xa3c0a687a6665b9f2f7e718215fbb9cb588283a9.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/43/0xa3c0a687a6665b9f2f7e718215fbb9cb588283a9.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_dev' of Factory.setDeveloper (/unique_chucks/43/0xa3c0a687a6665b9f2f7e718215fbb9cb588283a9.sol#8) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'contract_type' of Factory.createContract (/unique_chucks/43/0xa3c0a687a6665b9f2f7e718215fbb9cb588283a9.sol#14) is not in mixedCase
